message.content:
{"id": "116829", 
"title": "Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification", 
"description": "Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label height does not change immediately.\nSteps to reproduce:\n1. Add a label in the UI.\n2. Edit the font size of the label as \"18 points\".", 
"OB": "The label height is not changed immediately after modifying the font size of the label in the UI.", 
"EB": "The label height should change immediately after modifying the font size of the label in the UI.", 
"SR": "When modifying the font size of a label in the UI, the label height should change correspondingly."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
